response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. With its exceptional features and high-quality craftsmanship, it's truly a remarkable item that stands out in its category. I believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or serve you exceptionally well in your daily activities. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you for $145. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique value and benefits this product brings to its owner. I look forward to hearing your response and hope we can make this deal happen.", "product_price": 145}
